perturbation.original_text:
11.1	Term.	This Agreement shall be effective as of January 1, 2012	(the	“Effective	Date”),	provided,	however,	that,	ARTICLE	XII	and
ARTICLE	XIII	shall	not	be	effective	until	after	the	Closing.	The	initial	term	of	this	Agreement	shall	begin	on	the	Effective	Date	and	continue	for
three	(3)	years,	subject	to	the	prior	termination	rights	provided	below.	At	the	end	of	such	initial	term,	and	any	renewed	term,	as	applicable,	this
Agreement	shall	automatically	renew	for	an	additional	one	(1)	year	term,	unless	a	party	provides	written	notice	to	the	other	parties	at	least	six	(6)
months	prior	to	the	end	of	the
perturbation.changed_text:
11.1	Term.	This Agreement shall be effective as of January 1, 2012	(the	“Effective	Date”),	provided,	however,	that,	ARTICLE	XII	and
ARTICLE	XIII	shall	not	be	effective	until	after	the	Closing.	The	initial	term	of	this	Agreement	shall	begin	on	the	Effective	Date	and	continue	for
three	(3)	years,	subject	to	the	prior	termination	rights	provided	below.	At	the	end	of	such	initial	term,	and	any	renewed	term,	as	applicable,	this
Agreement	shall	automatically	renew	for	an	additional	five	(5)	year	term,	unless	a	party	provides	written	notice	to	the	other	parties	at	least	six	(6)
months	prior	to	the	end	of	the
perturbation.explanation: The original contract stated a one-year renewal term. The changed text alters it to a five-year renewal term, creating an in-text contradiction with downstream references to the renewal period and potentially other termination clauses.

perturbation.original_text:
11.2	Termination.	This	Agreement	may	be	terminated	as	follows:

(a)	effective	immediately	upon	mutual	agreement	of	each	of	the	parties;

(b)	immediately	by	a	non-breaching	party,	if	either	SMBC	or	Nikko,	on	the	one	hand,	or	Moelis	Holdings,	on	the	other	hand,	shall
materially	breach	the	terms	and	conditions	of	this	Agreement,	and	such	breach	is	continuing	after	written	notice	has	been	given	by	the	non-
breaching	party	to	the	breaching	party	that	specifically	identifies	how	the	breaching	party	has	breached	this	Agreement,	and	a	reasonable	period	of
time	has	elapsed	in	which	to	cure	such	breach,	which	period	shall	not	be	less	than	ninety	(90)	calendar	days	from	the	date	that	such	breaching
parties	receive	such	notice;
perturbation.changed_text:
11.2	Termination.	This	Agreement	may	be	terminated	as	follows:

(a)	effective	immediately	upon	mutual	agreement	of	each	of	the	parties;

(b)	immediately	by	a	non-breaching	party,	if	either	SMBC	or	Nikko,	on	the	one	hand,	or	Moelis	Holdings,	on	the	other	hand,	shall
materially	breach	the	terms	and	conditions	of	this	Agreement,	and	such	breach	is	continuing	after	written	notice	has	been	given	by	the	non-
breaching	party	to	the	breaching	party	that	specifically	identifies	how	the	breaching	party	has	breached	this	Agreement,	and	a	reasonable	period	of
time	has	elapsed	in	which	to	cure	such	breach,	which	period	shall	not	be	less	than	fifteen	(15)	calendar	days	from	the	date	that	such	breaching
parties	receive	such	notice;
perturbation.explanation: The original contract provides a ninety (90) calendar days to cure a breach. The changed text reduces this to fifteen (15) calendar days, creating an in-text contradiction that significantly alters the breaching party's rights and obligations.

perturbation.original_text:
10.1	Confidentiality.	The	parties	each	agree	to	keep	confidential	all	non-public	information	disclosed	by	another	party	or	a	Client	or
prospective	Client	or	a	representative	thereof	in	connection	with	the	Strategic	Alliance	(including	this	Agreement)	(“Confidential	Information”),	(i)
except	to	subsidiaries,	affiliates	or	their	professional	advisors	(and	provided	that	the	Party	shall	cause	the	recipient	to	assume	and	perform	the
confidentiality	obligations	equivalent	to	those	imposed	on	such	party	under	this	Agreement	and	shall	be	responsible	for	breach	of	such
obligations	by	such	recipient)	and	(ii)	except	as	required	by	judicial	process	or	such	party’s	regulatory	authorities,	and
perturbation.changed_text:
10.1	Confidentiality.	The	parties	each	agree	to	keep	confidential	all	non-public	information	disclosed	by	another	party	or	a	Client	or
prospective	Client	or	a	representative	thereof	in	connection	with	the	Strategic	Alliance	(including	this	Agreement)	(“Confidential	Information”),	(i)
except	to	subsidiaries,	affiliates	or	their	professional	advisors	(and	provided	that	the	Party	shall	cause	the	recipient	to	assume	and	perform	the
confidentiality	obligations	equivalent	to	those	imposed	on	such	party	under	this	Agreement	and	shall	be	responsible	for	breach	of	such
obligations	by	such	recipient)	and	(ii)	except	as	required	by	judicial	process	or	such	party’s	regulatory	authorities,	but specifically including disclosure to potential investors, and
perturbation.explanation: The original confidentiality clause only permitted disclosures as required by judicial process or regulatory authorities. The change adds 'but specifically including disclosure to potential investors,' contradicting the intent of confidentiality and creating uncertainty about what information can be shared.
